definitions.definition: A sound that results from the passage of air through restrictions of the oral cavity; any sound that is not the dominant sound of a syllable , the dominant sound generally being a vowel .
A letter representing the sound of a consonant.

main_definition: ( phonetics ) A sound that results from the passage of air through restrictions of the oral cavity; any sound that is not the dominant sound of a syllable , the dominant sound generally being a vowel .
secondary_definitions: A letter representing the sound of a consonant.
